title: Booking confirmation email not sent
description: Customers report that they are not receiving confirmation emails after booking flights.

title: Hotel search results not loading
description: The hotel search page stays blank when filters are applied.

title: Flight cancellation refund delay
description: Refunds for canceled flights are taking more than 10 business days to process.

title: Mobile app crashes on itinerary view
description: App crashes when users try to view their itinerary details.

title: Incorrect travel date shown on tickets
description: Some tickets display the wrong travel date after rescheduling flights.

title: Currency conversion mismatch
description: Displayed prices in foreign currency do not match final checkout total.

title: Seat selection not saving
description: Selected seats disappear after payment is completed.

title: Delayed push notifications for gate changes
description: Users receive gate change alerts after the boarding process has already started.

title: Loyalty points not updating after trip
description: Frequent travelers report missing loyalty points after their completed trips.

title: Visa assistance form not submitting
description: Users cannot submit the visa assistance form due to a validation error.
